Reviews.Title: 3G not working
Reviews.Author: Marship Support & Supply
Reviews.Content: SIm card slot didn't work on all 3 tablets, after hard reset it recognize a sim card but it fails to find any networks or even use the phone function on the tablet. This area has FULL coverage of AT&T; and T-Mobile.I noticed that 2 of the 3 tablets had a small tag on the side of the box with 'Verizon' and the 3rd tablet 'GSM'.I also tried with Verizon sim but no luck at all. Nothing happens, crappy tablet.

ProductInfo.Features:
ProntoTec 3G Enable Android Tablet PC
Dual Core 1.2GHz Processor / 512MB DDR3 / 4G Storage
7 Inch HD Touch Screen 1024 x 600 Pixels
Android 4.1.2, Dual Camera, WiFi, G-Sensor
3G Compatibility: AT&T; / T-Mobile / Verizon Wireless
ProductInfo.Name: ProntoTec 7 Inch 3G Android Tablet PC, Dual Core 1.2 Ghz Processor, Android 4.0, 4GB, DDR3 512MB RAM, Dual Camera, Wi-Fi, 3G Enable (AT&T / T-Mobile / Verizon Wireless)
